mapper.sql: BASETBL, FOODINFOTBL, FOODINTROTBL where BASETBL.CONTENTID = FOODINFOTBL.CONTENTID AND BASETBL.CONTENTID = FOODINTROTBL.CONTENTID AND BASETBL.MAPX != 9999 AND BASETBL.MAPY !=9999 AND FIRSTIMAGE != 'empty' AND BASETBL.CONTENTID

( select rownum as rno, t.* from (SELECT mapy, mapx, contentid, contenttypeid, title, firstimage, tel, addr1, siguncode , SQRT( POWER(( #{MY} - mapy) * 110979.309, 2) + POWER(( #{MX} - mapx) * 88907.949, 2) ) round FROM basetbl , (SELECT #{MY} v_x , #{MX} v_y , 110979.309 r_x , 88907.949 r_y , 2000.000 v_z FROM dual ) WHERE SQRT( POWER((v_x - mapy) * r_x, 2) + POWER((v_y - mapx) * r_y, 2) ) <= v_z AND mapy BETWEEN v_x - v_z / r_x AND v_x + v_z / r_x AND mapx BETWEEN v_y - v_z / r_y AND v_y + v_z / r_y and contentid != #{CON} and firstimage != 'empty' ORDER BY round)t)
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from basetbl where CONTENTTYPEID = 39 and mapx !=9999 and mapy !=9999 and firstimage != 'empty' and siguncode = #{sgCode}

select * from ( select rownum as rno, t.* from (select * from basetbl where CONTENTTYPEID = 39 and mapx !=9999 and mapy !=9999 and firstimage != 'empty' and siguncode = #{sgCode} order by firstimage desc)t) where rno BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE BASETBL SET READCOUNT = READCOUNT+1 WHERE CONTENTID = #{contentid}
